description: Fired for each pool a trade goes through.
sql_insert: INSERT INTO trade_pool (timestamp, transaction_id, receipt_id, block_height, trader, pool, token_in, token_out, amount_in, amount_out) SELECT to_timestamp((value->>'block_timestamp_nanosec')::bigint / 1000000000.0), value->>'transaction_id', value->>'receipt_id', (value->>'block_height')::bigint, value->>'trader', value->>'pool', value->>'token_in', value->>'token_out', (value->>'amount_in')::numeric, (value->>'amount_out')::numeric FROM jsonb_array_elements($1);

endpoints.query: SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'trader', trader, 'pool', pool, 'token_in', token_in, 'token_out', token_out, 'amount_in', amount_in, 'amount_out', amount_out) FROM trade_pool WHERE (($1->>'before_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id < ($1->>'before_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50;

SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'trader', trader, 'pool', pool, 'token_in', token_in, 'token_out', token_out, 'amount_in', amount_in, 'amount_out', amount_out) FROM trade_pool WHERE (($1->>'after_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id > ($1->>'after_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 50;

SELECT json_build_object('id', id, 'timestamp', timestamp, 'transaction_id', transaction_id, 'receipt_id', receipt_id, 'block_height', block_height, 'trader', trader, 'pool', pool, 'token_in', token_in, 'token_out', token_out, 'amount_in', amount_in, 'amount_out', amount_out) FROM trade_pool WHERE trader = ($1->>'trader') AND (($1->>'before_id')::bigint IS NULL OR id < ($1->>'before_id')::bigint) ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 50;
